titleInfo.title: Interactions of local movement detectors enhance the detection of rotation : optokinetic experiments with the rock crab, *Pachygrapsus marmoratus*

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Kern, R., Nalbach, H.-O., Varjú, D.: Interactions of local movement detectors enhance the detection of rotation : optokinetic experiments with the rock crab, *Pachygrapsus marmoratus*. Visual Neuroscience. 10, 643-652 (1993).
